name: The Zen of Not Giving a Fck
description:
Play this NFT whenever you need to take a moment for yourself, and let it be your meditation guide. It is a reminder that some things around us don’t deserve the attention we give them. The negativity, the judgement from others, the self-doubt and all that noise simply don’t matter. What matters is the present moment and your inner peace.

Digital animation by Tosik.
Year: 2021
0:24 seconds loop
